Terra

> 
> 
> 37 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> 10^12^
> 

Yes, that is the number of hills that I have now. What did you think I was doing when I was away. Well, off to make moar hills. See you in another 10^12 hours or so (with a margin of plus or minus 10^12 hours).

Speaking of terra, BTW All my hills are on New Terra/Ilus safe on the other side of a ring gate. Good luck trying to sabotage it (It would be such a shame if something happened to it)
